abstract: Indiana House passes bill to protect business owners who do not want to provide services for same-sex couples based on religious grounds.
lead_paragraph: The House passed a bill Monday to protect business owners who do not want to provide services for same-sex couples.

headline.main: Indiana: Exemption for Service to Gays Advances
headline.print_headline: Indiana: Exemption for Service to Gays Advances

snippet: The House passed a bill Monday to protect business owners who do not want to provide services for same-sex couples.
